name: Planet Cracker (Brutiful Games)
description:
Defend new mars from the planet crackers.  Destroy their harvester before time runs out!  You have been given an older missile-launching tank to destroy waves of their forces as well as their pylons.  

Use space-bar to launch upwards and smash down, creating a ring of damage.  Watch out though, the fall damage is likely to knock some of the control modules loose.

Created for the ManaBurst1 Jam in 72 Hours.

Design, Programming, Art:  Chris Walka

Github Repo:
https://github.com/ACowboyKiller/ManaBurst1
